title: Shocking Local Football Challenge | 10 Sport
description: An NPL NSW player has been stood down after a horrific challenge in the weekend's match between NWS Spirit and Sutherland Sharks.  NWS Spirit's Callum Kealy has been stood down by his club following this incident with Sutherland's Jamie Percevski. Kealy was shown a red card as a result of the challenge, with his Spirit side going on to win the match 1-0.  The incident has drawn widespread criticism online, with the original clip being viewed more than three million times. title: Israel President's Bondi Visit, Teen Killer Blames Acne Drug, New AI Trend Warning | 10 News+
description: Israel's President, who touched down in the Sydney today brought two stones and warning for the people of Australia.  Pope Leo 16th will head to Australia for the first time in 20 years in order to attend the International Eucharistic Congress in 2028.  A criminal case in the United States has put a popular acne treatment in the spotlight - after a 17-year-old boy tried to claim the meds led to homicidal thoughts, before he shot two of his friends.   Alarm over the new AI trend on social media -- why there's a dark side to those caricatures you're seeing everyone post online. description: Seattle punter Michael Dickson has become the second Australian in two years to win a Superbowl. title: Israel's President Isaac Herzog Pays Tribute At Scene Of Bondi Beach Terror Attack | 10 News
description: Israel’s President has commenced his four-day Australian tour, making his first stop at the scene of the Bondi terror attack.  Isaac Herzog and First Lady Michal Mik-arl have further engagements tonight, demonstrating solidarity with the Jewish community.  Wherever the Head of State goes, an enormous security operation follows.  Across the city tonight, those opposed to his presence are also making their voices heard. title: Hong Kong Court Sentences Pro-Democracy Figure To 20 years In Prison | 10 News
